note:
Aviation technician and starship designer.
Novelist and Archer. Scuba diver and world builder.
Interstellar spy and plumber.
Pianist and solver of crossword puzzles.
Esperantist and student of German.

Born February 10.
Lives in rural Oregon.
memoirsofanearthling.blog

Author of "Memory and Metaphor", chosen by the SFWA for inclusion in their 2023 story bundle, "Space is Big. Really Big."
"Traveler" coming out October 4, 2024
"Slavery's Avatar" coming late 2024
